overview: Ashutosh Mishra serves as Director Services for Navatar’s Technical Excellence Center in New Delhi and is responsible for project delivery and software development. He brings extensive experience in project management, distributed architecture and process re-engineering of large-scale, enterprise-wide software development projects. Ashutosh has led implementation of several large SaaS deployments. He has held senior management positions with several leading software product and services companies including Convergys and Amdocs before joining Navatar.
